The Adamant plateskirt is a plateskirt made out of adamant. Adamant plateskirts have the same stats as adamant platelegs, the only difference between the two items is their appearance and weight (the plateskirt is 1kg lighter). Players often buy these instead of adamant platelegs, because they are in stock more often.

They can be made at level 86 Smithing using 3 adamantite bars, which grants 187.5 experience.

[[File:Adamant plateskirt detail.png|120px|left]]
The '''Adamant plateskirt''' is a plateskirt made out of [[adamant]]. Adamant plateskirts have the same stats as [[adamant platelegs]], the only difference between the two items is their appearance and weight (the plateskirt is 1kg lighter). Players often buy these instead of [[adamant platelegs]], because they are in stock more often.

They can be made at level 86 [[Smithing]] using 3 [[adamantite bar]]s, which grants 187.5 experience.
